overview: Magnus Jern is CEO & Founder of Golden Gekko which is the leading mobile app solution provider in Europe. He has worked with Product Development and Digital Marketing for Telecoms and Consumer Brands for the past 12 years. His early work included working on groundbreaking digital marketing initiatives for major brands such as Volvo, Ikea, AstraZeneca, Nike and BT. He then spent 5 years marketing new products and services for Orange Group in Scandinavia and later Vodafone Group including award winning and industry leading Vodafone live! across Europe and Asia. His last assignment for Vodafone was to develop the group strategy for mobile marketing on behalf of the product marketing team. Since taking on the position as CEO of Golden Gekko Magnus has also managed the mobile campaigns for several of the worldâ€™s largest global consumer brands. Magnus currently serves on the board of Golden Gekko, Wireless Solutions, Barcelona by Us and NComVA.
